Detailed Description

Base for tagged container node.

All container node types based on tagged_gc technique must be derived from this class.

Container node requirements:
  • The member function destroy_data should be provided. This function clears old content of node's data; for example, it may call destructor: 
                    void destroy_data()
                { 
                    m_data.T::~T(); 
                }
  • The member function construct_data should be provided. The function acts as constructor for the nodes popped from free-list; for example, it may call in-place new: 
                    void construct_data()               
                { 
                    new ( &m_data ) T; 
                }
                void construct_data( const T& src )  
                { 
                    new ( &m_data ) T( src ); 
                }
